title: Reconnect button stuck
body:
My game went from champ select to the reconnect screen. Cant reconnect to the game the button just turns grey for a sec then i'm back to the reconnect screen. restart doesn't help. repair tool picks up no problems.
is there a fix for this?
can i get banned by the leave buster?

replies.body:
Hmmm that sounds pretty frustrating. Usually when those Play or Reconnect buttons turn grey it's because the client isn't detecting any connection with the servers. I would first make sure to cover the basics with the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and try using an ethernet cable instead if this happens often. 

If that's not helping, I'd go ahead and hit up the techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your network logs to see what's going on.

You shouldn't be getting any punishments if this was just the first time either. You'll only get punished if it starts happening rather often.
